body:
#### PR description:

Fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47233. See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47233#issuecomment-2633541829 in particular.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1213

#### PR validation:

Ran step3 of workflow 12834.423 on CMSSW_15_0_X_2025-01-30-1100 with and without https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47226, and with this PR the DQM output agrees between the two.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to 15_0_X if master moves to 15_1_X before this PR gets merged.
